title: 'Beauty And The Beast' Inspired Rose Makeup Brushes Are Real | Letty B | KISS 95.7
text:
'Beauty And The Beast' Inspired Rose Makeup Brushes Are Real posted by Letty B - A photo posted by @storybookcosmetics on Feb 12, 2017 at 2:35pm PST 
Source Instagram 
We live in a magical time when the fairytale world we loved as children is now coming to reality – and we have Storybook Cosmetics to thank! The company just gave us a sneak peek at their rose brushes inspired by Beauty and the Beast – and they’re absolutely gorgeous! 
The rose brush is suppose to imitate a real life rose. The hairs are dyed red and are attached to a green handle with ‘leaves’ and ‘thorns’. Storybook Cosmetics did announce, however, that there are more changes to happen before they release the brush collection. They reportedly want to make the brush hairs a little darker and extend the length of the brush before they are available to the public. That way the ‘leaves’ won’t get in the way when you powder or go for the perfect contour! A video posted by @storybookcosmetics on Jan 12, 2017 at 12:15pm PST A photo posted by @storybookcosmetics on Dec 30, 2016 at 8:28pm PST 
Source Instagram 
There hasn’t been an official release date set for the brushes, but Storybook Cosmetics previously said they were due for release in the Spring. 
I cannot wait!
